task.title: Credit Card Present
task.shortdesc: The credit card is physically present during the transaction.

step.cmd: Use a Universal Serial Bus (USB) or unencrypted magnetic stripe reader (MSR) to swipe the credit card.
When you swipe the credit card, most of the fields will automatically populate.
You may need to add some missing information manually.
The credit card owner must electronically sign to authorize the transaction.

stepresult.p: Once the transaction is complete, acknowledgement and reporting information will be automatically generated.
